mergeStringStringMaps

public static void mergeStringStringMaps(Map<String,String> lowPriority,
                                         Map<String,String> highPriority)
Merging entries of higher priority Map to the lower priority one. In case the keys are exist in both Map, the value lowPriority Map.Entry in is replaced with the one from highPriority.

Parameters:
lowPriority - Map to be merged to.
highPriority - Map to be merged from.

Returns:
Map of String parameters.
